dansFunSEOComments.targetKeyword: Ensure your target keyword appears in the title tag, meta description, headings (H1, H2, etc.), and image alt tags.
dansFunSEOComments.contentLength: Google recommends each page have at least 300 words so crawlers can get a clear idea of its purpose.
dansFunSEOComments.h1: Ideally there should be one <h1> per page that matches SEO keywords/meta tags.
dansFunSEOComments.imageSize: Images should be < 100kb to optimize how fast the page loads for SEO purposes. Images over 100kb will be tagged with their size.
dansFunSEOComments.imageAlt: Images should have descriptive alt text that ideally matches the content on the page.
